page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content:
{MAIN INDUSTRIES
{Wm CLARK STEPHEN McGAWN Bros. {CLYDE GRAVURE McQUATER Bros. { DOUGLAS Eng. INTERPAK { FAULDS BUILDERS { WEST COAST PRINTERS {Wm CLARK STEPHEN}make boxes and print paper. They sell to the advertising industry and employ 22 workers. They are a Glasgow based firm and may expand in future. {CLYDE GRAVURE}produce labels for whisky and wine bottles, and do packaging. They have been in business for 17 yrs, employ 70 and may expand. {DOUGLAS Eng.}produce sheet metal fab- rications and plastic injection moulds for the computer industry. Originally established in N. Ireland they employ 100 and have been in Maybole for 10yrs
